title: cannot connect when trying to sign in
body: im having difficulty logging in. when i try it says i have failed the attempt to login in and wont let me

replies.body:
If this is occurring consistently, there seems like there is either an issue connecting to our Login Servers, or some misconfigured settings on your computer that is preventing it from doing so.  In an effort to resolve the root cause, make sure to complete all of the steps found in our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944).  

Reply back and let me know if it doesn't help to resolve this!
